import React from 'react' {/*export default function FuelStorageForm() { return (

SECTION 1: GENERAL INFORMATION

FUEL STORAGE TANK INSPECTION CHECKLIST — CONFIDENTIAL SAFETY & COMPLIANCE RECORD

Tank Location
Tank ID / Number
Fuel Type
Inspection Date
Time
Inspected By
Signature
Position/Title
) } */} export default function FuelStorageInspectionForm() { const sections = [ { title: 'SECTION 1: GENERAL INFORMATION', fields: [ 'Tank Location', 'Tank ID / Number', 'Fuel Type', 'Inspection Date', 'Time', 'Inspected By', 'Sign', 'Position/Title', ], }, { title: 'SECTION 2: TANK EXTERIOR & STRUCTURE', checklist: [ 'Tank clearly labeled with fuel type and hazard signs', 'No visible leaks, drips, or corrosion', 'Tank surface (paint/coating) in good condition', 'Tank foundation secure and stable', 'Access ladders, railings, and platforms in safe condition', 'Tank vents unobstructed and functional', 'Security measures in place (locks, fencing, CCTV)', ], }, { title: 'SECTION 3: PIPING & CONNECTIONS', checklist: [ 'Pipes and hoses intact (no cracks, kinks, or leaks)', 'Valves are functional', 'Fuel transfer pumps in working order', 'Spill containment tray/bund area clean and dry', 'All fittings tight and properly sealed', ], }, { title: 'SECTION 4: SAFETY & ENVIRONMENTAL CONTROLS', checklist: [ 'Emergency shutoff switch accessible and labeled', 'Fire extinguisher nearby and inspected', 'Spill kit available and stocked', 'Adequate ventilation around storage area', 'No signs of soil contamination near tank', ], }, { title: 'SECTION 5: FUEL QUALITY & LEVEL CHECK', checklist: [ 'Fuel level within safe operating range', 'No signs of water or sediment contamination', 'Manual/automated gauge working properly', 'Inspection records and fuel delivery logs up to date', ], }, { title: 'SECTION 6: ISSUES IDENTIFIED / CORRECTIVE ACTIONS', actions: ['Issue', 'Corrective Action', 'Responsible Person', 'Target Date'], }, { title: 'SECTION 7: SIGN-OFF', fields: ['Inspector Name', 'Signature', 'Date', 'Supervisor Review Date'], }, ]; return (

Fuel Storage Tank Inspection Checklist

))} {/* Sections 2–5 — Checklist */} {sections .filter(section => section.checklist) .map(section => (

))} {/* Section 6 — Corrective Actions */} {sections .filter(section => section.actions) .map(section => (

{section.actions.map((heading, index) => ( ))} {section.actions.map((action, index) => ( ))}

); }
